message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
Alice, I understand the need for fairness, so I'm proposing a more balanced split this time.  Let's not let this drag on and lose value.
Bob, time is literally money for you!  My offer is still generous, take it before it shrinks further!
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm offering a reasonable compromise.  Take this deal before inflation eats away at my share any further!
Bob, I'm offering you a lifeline! This is your chance to salvage a decent portion before it dwindles even further. Don't be greedy!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, and we both walk away with something substantial.  Don't let greed cloud your judgment.
Bob, this is more than fair considering the time pressure and inflation working against you.  Don't be stubborn! Take the deal!
